thread.title: Delete Facebook, Drink More Beer - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Alex Frangos
title: Delete Facebook, Drink More Beer - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Stop staring at and and do something useful with your life, like spending more time in a pub. A self-serving suggestion, no doubt, that comes from U.K. pub chain .
